text: Operation Petticoat is a 1959 American World War II comedy movie directed by Blake Edwards and starring Cary Grant, Tony Curtis, Joan O'Brien, Dina Merrill, Gene Evans, Dick Sargent, Arthur O'Connell, Virginia Gregg. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1960. It was spun off into a television series in 1977. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1959 comedy movies Category:1959 war movies Category:American war movies Category:American comedy movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Blake Edwards
title: Operation Petticoat
